'''''Amon Hen'' 223''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[May]] [[2010]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen223.jpg|Roac the Raven speaks to Thorin Oakenshield]]''

** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork

* [[Oxonmoot]] Announcements
* Dates for your Diary
* Mereth Adethad Invitation (Slovak Tolkien Society event)
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Fraser on Tolkien
** By: Murray Smith
* Advertisement: Moreton-in-Marsh/Banbury Museum exhibitions
* Report: Bodleian Library World Book Day Exhibition
** By: Martin Smith
* Bill the Pony
** By: [[Robert S. Blackham|Bob Blackham]]
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* TS Code of Conduct
** By: Madeline Flint

** By: Denis Bridoux
* Review: ''The Experience of Film Location Tourists''
** By: Robin Ablitt
* Review: ''[[One Man Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: Paul Cockburn
* Review: ''One Man Lord of the Rings''
** By: Philip Ballard

* Review: ''[[Tolkien in Poetry and Song|Lembas Extra 2009]]''
